description.name: PPR Pipe Welding Machine 20-63mm
description.long_desc:
800 Watt Pipe Welding Machine ensures quick heating of welding sockets. The machine is used for connecting plastic pipes such as PP-R, PB, PE, PE-X.


Product Features



  • Two heads can be simultaneously installed on a unit

  • Plastic pipe shears of 20 – 63 mm

  • Temperature Dial: 0-300°C

  • Teflon-coated welding sockets


Technical Data



  • Power: 800W

  • Input Voltage: 230V

  • Resistor Material: Stainless Steel

  • Thermostat Regulation Indicator: 50 – 300°C

  • Welding sockets: 20mm; 25mm; 32mm; 40mm; 50mm; 63mm

  • Protection Class: IP 44

description.name: PPR Pipe Welding Machine 16-63mm
description.long_desc:
Powerful 1500 Watt Pipe Welding Machine ensures quick heating of welding sockets. The machine is used for connecting plastic pipes such as PP-R, PB, PE, PE-X.


Product Features



  • Two heads can be simultaneously installed on a unit

  • Plastic pipe shears of 16 – 63 mm

  • Temperature Dial: 0-300°C

  • Teflon-coated welding sockets


Technical Data



  • Power: 1500W

  • Input Voltage: 230V

  • Resistor Material: Stainless Steel

  • Thermostat Regulation Indicator: 50 – 300°C

  • Welding sockets: 16mm, 20mm; 25mm; 32mm; 40mm; 50mm; 63mm

  • Protection Class: IP 44


Package Contents:



  • 1pc Pipe Welding Machine

  • 7pcs welding sockets: 16mm, 20mm; 25mm; 32mm; 40mm; 50mm; 63mm

  • 1pc measure tape 3m

  • 1 pair of Gloves

  • 1pc screwdriver

  • 1pc PVC 42mm pipe cutter

  • 1pc stand

  • 1pc hex wrench

description.name: Plastic welding gun
description.long_desc:
Powerful 1080 Watt Hot Welding Machine for plastic. Special design heat gun produces a jet of hot air that softens the parts to be joined. Suitable for PE, PP, EVA, PVC, TPO, PVDF, etc.


Product Features



  • Large air volume and high pressure

  • Suitable for PE, PP, EVA, PVC, TPO, PVDF

  • Non-slip rubber ring

  • Temperature Scope: 20 - 500°C

  • Temperature Dial: 9-steps


Technical Data



  • Heating Power: 1080W

  • Air Volume: 10m3/h

  • Input Voltage: 230V

  • Air Pressure: 2800 pa

  • Insulating Intensity: 3750V

  • Noise : ?65db


Package Contents:



  • 1080W Plastic Welder Gun

  • 2pcs carbon brush

  • 1pc 40mm flat slit nozzle

  • 1pc 7mm wide round welding nozzle

  • 1pc pressure silicon roller

  • 1pc screwdriver

description.name: Hot Stapler For Plastic Repair PREMIUM
description.long_desc:
Hot Stapler Plastic is a repair system for all types of plastics using heated metallic staples. Quick and effective method works on all thermoplastic. Supplied with 600 staples.


Product Features



  • Quick and efficient repair method

  • 3 levels of heating for the staples

  • ON/OFF switch

  • Delivered with 600 staples


Technical Data



  • Rated Power: 20W

  • Rated Current: 0,1 A

  • Input Voltage: 230V / 50Hz

  • Output Voltage: 0,8 - 1,2 V

  • Staples Diameter: 0,6 - 0,8 mm


Package Contents:



  • Controller and wand

  • Rs16 0,6mm flat staples

  • Rs18 0,8mm flat staples

  • Rs26 0,6mm wave staples

  • Rs28 0,8mm wave staples

  • Rs38 0,8mm corner staples

  • Rs46 0,6mm outside corner staples

  • 1pc diagonal cutter

  • 1pc storage box

description.long_desc:

átype - GWP25

-capacity - 130 l/miná
-Diameter of suction / discharge- suction 1 inch/ discharge 1 inch
-medium - clean water
-Maximum suction lift - 7 m

-Engine capacity - 42.7 cm3
-mixture fuel/oil á- 25/1
-engine power - 1.5 kW (2.0 KM) 6500 obr/min
-dimensions in mm [length x width x heigth] - 335 x 250 x 335 mm
-weigth - 7.2 kg

description.name: Gasoline Water Pump 2"
description.long_desc:
Gasoline water pump 2"

á

Perfect for pumping water in and out.ááStrong construction makes the pump reliable and practical.á

á

Usage:

Wateringáfields and yards, pumping water out of flooded rooms, trenches and artificial water reservoirs. Perfect for using in places with no electricity.

Technical data:

Engine powerá6,5 KM
Petrol type: petrolá95 lub 98 (with no addition of oil)
Output diameterá2" - 52mm
Maximum performanceáok 600 l/min
Effective performance: 400l/min
Pressureá3 bars
Height of water columná26m
Water transferáat a horizontal distanceá300m
Max level differenceáwhileásuckingá8m
Fuel consumptionácir.á0,7-0,9 l/h
Max rpmá3600/min
Used oilá10w-40
1 change afterá5 hours, followingáeach 50áhours
Oil level equal to bottom edge of filler
Weight cir. 30 kg
Four - stroke valve-in-head engine

description.name: Electric wrench 1/2 + sockets
description.long_desc:
Specifications::

* Power 800W

* Voltage 230V/50Hz

* Maximum turning effort 320 Nm

* Socket endings 1/2"

* Maximum rpm 2200rpm/min

* áSpeed right/left

á

The set includes:

* Electronic wrench 800W

* Suitcase

* Sockets: 17mm, 19mm, 21mm, 22mm

* Spare brushes

* Manual



Professional electronic wrench of 1800V power and high speed moment up to 650Nmá

Strong metal casingá

Ergonomic handle

Handle with rubber plug improving security and comfort of work. á

Working swicth left / right

Replaceable carbon brushes: áoutside access

Supply 230v 50 hz

Weigth around 4,9 kg

Dimensions 38 x 30 x 12 CM

Length of cable cir. á2 m

á

description.name: Air Impact Wrench 1/2" PROFI with regulation
description.long_desc:
Specifications:

Power: 1050W

Voltage: 230V, ~50Hz

Speed of rotation: 2200rpm

Turning moment: 100- 500Nm

Arbor dimension: 1/2"

Electronic display.á



The set includes:

Electric spanner

Sockets: 17 á19 á21 á22 mm

Additional spare brushes

Suitcase

Manual

á

Ended with standard finish 1/2". The set includes 4 the most popular sockets for bolts in car wheels: 17, 19, á21, 22 mm.

Switch on the handle rotates to both left and right.á

Solid metal casing and improves working safety and comfort.

á

category.name: Electric and Petrol Hedge Trimmers
category.path: Garden\Trimming and Cutting\Electric and Petrol Hedge Trimmers

category_idosell.path: Garden\Trimming and Cutting\Electric and Petrol Hedge Trimmers

description.name: Hedge trimmer 55cm
description.long_desc:
2KM John Gardener petrol hedge trimmer


The trimmer is equipped with a 2 HP internal combustion engine, thanks to which they can cope with all kinds of shrubs and hedges.
Thanks to the use of a double-sided cutting bar (length 55 cm), the device can be maneuvered in two directions.
An additional advantage of JOHN GARDENER scissors is the handle that can be rotated 90 ° to the right or left, which allows comfortable work during vertical and horizontal cutting.


 


Product features:



  • made with the utmost care

  • double-sided cutting bar with a length of 55 cm

  • hardened cutting blades

  • handle can be rotated 90 ° to the right or left

  • 2 HP engine equipped with a Japanese-made diaphragm carburetor

  • hardened crankshaft


Technical Specifications:



  • Engine power: 2 HP

  • Blade working length: 550 mm

  • Tank capacity: 0.6 l

  • Maximum speed: 9000 rpm

  • Start: manual

  • Fuel - mixture: (20: 1 for the first 5 refills then 25: 1)

description.name: Earh Auger + 25 cm DRILL
description.long_desc:
Earth Auger is an ideal device for working in the garden or building. It allows to drill holes in the ground easily.

The device is equipped with two-stroked engine. High-quality carburator and other engine parts let the device work properly every time it is used.

á

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Efficient engine with high power of 5,2KM

Engine displacement 49,8cm

A mixture of petrol 1:25

Grips x4

Height of the device 100cm

weight around 10kg

Wrench set

Container for mixing

Polish Manual

á

In case of losing control of the device, the safety system stops the engine.

á
description.short_desc:
Earth Auger is an ideal device for working in the garden or building. It allows to drill holes in the ground easily.

The device is equipped with two-stroked engine. High-quality carburator and other engine parts let the device work properly every time it is used.

á

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Efficient engine with high power of 5,2KM

Engine displacement 49,8cm

A mixture of petrol 1:25

Grips x4

Height of the device 100cm

weight around 10kg

Wrench set

Container for mixing

Polish Manual

á

In case of losing control of the device, the safety system stops the engine.

á
description.description:
Earth Auger is an ideal device for working in the garden or building. It allows to drill holes in the ground easily.

The device is equipped with two-stroked engine. High-quality carburator and other engine parts let the device work properly every time it is used.

á

PRODUCT INFORMATION

Efficient engine with high power of 5,2KM

Engine displacement 49,8cm

A mixture of petrol 1:25

Grips x4

Height of the device 100cm

weight around 10kg

Wrench set

Container for mixing

Polish Manual

á

In case of losing control of the device, the safety system stops the engine.

á

description.name: Reduce speed asy for earth auger
description.long_desc:
Przekładnia kątowa do spalinowej wiertnicy glebowej

Przekładnia kątowa jest to część zamienna do wiertnic glebowych zasilanych silnikami spalinowymi.

Cechy produktu:

  • wysokiej jakości wykonanie
  • wnętrze przekładni wykonane z utwardzanych metalowych elementów smarowanych podczas pracy olejem
  • przeznaczona do świdra spalinowego
  • uniwersalny wałek o średnicy 20mm, powszechnie stosowany w większości tego typu urządzeń
  • kosz sprzęgła o średnicy 78 mm

Multifunctional brush cutter 4in1

Solid kit:

á

  • corpsáwith the handle and two-way engineá
  • adapteráwith possibilityáof assumption the gut or cutting shield
  • adapteráscissors to the hedge-clippers
  • adapter saw with chain baráá14"áand cutting chain
  • nyllon cutter
  • 3T bladeá255 x 25,4 x 1,8 mm<
  • Bag 600 mlfor the blending fuel
  • shoulder belt
  • supported devices

description.name: Brush cutter with antivibration system + 3T blade + 1pc nylone rope
description.long_desc:
Brush cutter with anti-vibration systemá52cc JGá

á

Volumeá51,7 cm3
Fuel tank volumeá850 ml
Rotating blade direction: lewo
Weight with no fuelá7,5kg
Oil/fuel ratioá1:25
Engineá2-stroke, 1 cylinder
Air cooling
Revolutionsá7000 rpm
Manual start-up

á

Brush cutteráJG is perfect for places which cannot be reached by a lawnmower.áThe brush cutter is equipped in solid 2-stroke engineáandáadjustable handle typeáV, what makes control easier. Anti-vibration system.

á

-áTrimmer head
-áCutting blade with 3 teeth
-áHarness
-áContainer for preparing mixture
-áManual
-áTools for setting brush cutter

á

description.name: Brush Cutter with 3pcs nylon cutter,one pc 3 teeth mental blade,one pc 8 teeth mental blade. Mask,earmuffler,nylon line
description.long_desc:
SPECIFICATIONS:

Capacity: 42,7 cm3
Volume of petrol container 1000 ml
Direction of angle twist: lewo
Ignition plug: BM6A
Weigth without petrol 7,1kg
Mixture rate oil:petrol á1:25
2 stroke engine, 1 cylinder
Air cooling
Speed 8000 rpm
Manual start

THE SET INCLUDES:

Brush cutter JOHN GARDENERá
3 nylon cutters + one extra reinforced nylon line
3 teeth cutting blade
blade for wood
braces with a connector
Mask
Ear protection
Tank for preparing mixture
Manual
Tools for assembly

Brush cutter JG witháaccessories + oil 100ml

description.name: Element for fastening handles
description.long_desc:
Uchwyt mocujący rączki kosy spalinowej

Uchwyt (krzyżak) mocujący rączki kosy spalinowej. Pasuje do wszystkich kos spalinowych w których średnica rury wynosi 28 mm, a średnica rączek 20 mm.

description.name: Oil Tank Cap for Brushcutter
description.long_desc:
Zbiornika paliwa do kosy spalinowej, świdra

Korek zbiornika paliwa przeznaczony do silników spalinowych o pojemności od 40cc do 50cc, stosowanych najczęściej w kosach spalinowych, wiertnicach itp.

Pasuje do większości modeli podkaszarek firm takich jak: JOHN GARDENER, mastiff, demon, falon tech, grand, schwarzbau, nac, eurotec, eurocraft, matrix, powermat, magnum, demon, flora, harder, victus, flo,, steel, falon tech, lider, kraft welle, kraft delle, castorama, favoryt, cedrus

description.name: Headgear with PVC Face Shield
description.long_desc:
Headgear with Face Shield. Extra durable and comfortable head and face protection for workers in metalworking, utilities, wood working, and many other industries.


Product Features



  • Crystal clear PVC visor for clear vision

  • Visor attached to frame with cam locks; can be easily replaced

  • Durable hard plastic headgear

  • Ratchet suspension for quick & easy adjustment

  • Can be worn with most goggles and respirators
description.short_desc:
Headgear with Face Shield. Extra durable and comfortable head and face protection for workers in metalworking, utilities, wood working, and many other industries.


Product Features



  • Crystal clear PVC visor for clear vision

  • Visor attached to frame with cam locks; can be easily replaced

  • Durable hard plastic headgear

  • Ratchet suspension for quick & easy adjustment

  • Can be worn with most goggles and respirators
description.description:

description.name: Nyllon cutter STANDARD QUALITY
description.long_desc:
Głowica do podkaszarki/kosy spalinowej

Uniwersalna głowica półautomatyczna pasująca do większości kos i podkaszarek spalinowych. Głowica umożliwia zamontowanie żyłki o ;średnicy od 1,5 do 3 mm. W komplecie żyłka o okrągłym profilu i średnicy 2 mm.
Zwiększona grubość pokrywy i szpuli w miejscu gdzie mają one kontakt z podłożem, gwarantuje większą wytrzymałość.
Mocowanie: ;śruba z lewym gwintem o średnicy 9mm (10mm na podkaszarce). ;
Głowica półautomatyczna, aby wysunąć żyłkę należy uderzyć przyciskiem głowicy w podłoże.

Pasuje do kos:

  • GEKO
  • Demon: RQ415, RQ430 , RQ480 , RQ500
  • NAC - CG430N ,CG33N ,CG360N ,CG430B ,CG330B ,CG260B
  • ALKO - BC301
  • Victus: BC32, BC 36, BC43, BC301
  • EINHELL
  • EUROKRAFT
  • CRAFT-MEN
  • UNISTAR
  • UNICH TECH
  • MATRIX
  • QX
  • UNITECH
  • FALON-TECH
  • GUDE
  • WANDER
  • OSA
  • MAGNUM
  • EUROTEC
  • BASS POLSKA
  • POWERMAT
  • Echo: SMR2305, SMR250, SMR330, SMR350, SMR4000, SMR500
  • Kawasaki: KBH27, KBH34, KBH43, KBH48
  • Makita: DBC250, DBC290, DBC300, DBC340
  • Honda: UMK425, UMK431, UMK435
  • Dolmar: MS25, MS30, MS400
  • Texas: CG260, CG330, CG430, BC300, BC330
  • oraz wiele innych

Specyfikacja techniczna:

  • Średnica głowicy: 113 mm
  • Wysokość głowicy: 400-700 l/min
  • Średnica przycisku: 50 mm
  • Średnica gwintu w bębnie: 9 mm
  • Średnica gwintu w podkaszarce: 10 mm
  • Kolor: w zależności od dostawy: czerwony / czarny

description.name: Carburetor for brush cutter + gasket
description.long_desc:
Specifications:

Affixing on 2 screws

Screw spacing 30mm

Total heigth 90mm

Thickness 30mm

Diameter of the hole 15mm
